name: 3D Bloxorz
description:
Bloxorz is the 3D puzzle game, where you have to reach on the special checkpoint

There are 10 different levels. The first one is the easiest one, where you got no problems moving on the floor. It gets hard level after level. There are glass puzzles and moving puzzles as well. So, you have to find a way to the final checkpoint.

Sometimes there are many ways to finish, sometimes, there is the only one.

There is skip level function as well.

We will add new levels on the monthly basis.
